original_text: The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle,
korean_text: 곧 회막과 증거궤와 그 위의 속죄소와 회막의 모든 기구와

sentences.original_text: and the ark of the testimony
and the mercy seat that is thereupon
and all the furniture of the tabernacle
